name: WorkspaceNavigation
description: Lets users switch between and manage workspaces (archived=false by default).
location: Top of the sidebar or header.

sub.name: WorkspaceSelector
sub.description: Dropdown or list of workspaces to switch the active workspace.
sub.location: Top of the sidebar or nav bar.

sub.name: CreateWorkspaceOverlay
sub.description: Full-page wizard to create a new workspace (extends BaseOverlay).

sub.name: WorkspaceNameInput
sub.description: Field for entering workspace name/description.
sub.location: Step 1 of the create workspace wizard.

name: ChannelList
description: Displays all channels/DMs the user has in the current workspace. Excludes archived unless requested.

sub.name: ChannelEntry
sub.description: Individual channel item; click to open channel.

sub.name: CreateChannelButton
sub.description: Opens a modal for channel settings.

name: DirectMessagesList
description: Lists direct or multi-user DMs. Each item references a DM channel.
location: Below the channel list in the sidebar.

sub.name: DmEntry
sub.description: Represents a single DM conversation.

sub.name: NewDmButton
sub.description: Opens an overlay to start a new DM.

name: MessageInputBox
description: Interface for composing and sending messages (with file uploads, emojis).

sub.name: TextInputArea
sub.description: Where the user types the message.
sub.location: Central portion of the input box.

sub.name: SendButton
sub.description: Dispatches the typed message.

sub.name: FileUploadButton
sub.description: Select or drag-drop files for upload.

sub.name: EmojiPickerToggle
sub.description: Opens the emoji picker to insert emojis.

name: ChatArea
description: Displays the current channel/DM conversation, messages, pinned items, threads. Hides messages with deleted=true unless specially handled.
location: Main central region of the interface.

sub.name: MessageDisplayArea
sub.description: Scrollable list of messages; shows placeholder if deleted=true.

sub.name: ThreadViewer
sub.description: Displays replies in a dedicated panel.

sub.name: PinnedItemsPanel
sub.description: Displays pinned messages with optional reason.

name: BaseOverlay
description: A shared base component for overlays/modals across the app.

name: FileSharingOverlay
description: Interface for uploading/sharing files in a channel or DM, extends BaseOverlay.
location: Launched from the FileUploadButton or a menu.

sub.name: FileUploadInterface
sub.description: Drag-and-drop or file picker UI with progress bars.

sub.name: RecipientSelectionPanel
sub.description: Optional panel for choosing recipients beyond the current channel.

sub.name: UploadControlButtons
sub.description: Confirm or cancel uploading files.

name: SearchBar
description: Search across messages, files, or users with optional filters (includeArchived, includeDeleted).

sub.name: SearchInputField
sub.description: The text input for entering the search query.

sub.name: SearchFilterDropdown
sub.description: Filter results by type, date, or user, plus archived/deleted toggles.

name: UserPresenceIndicator
description: Displays a user's presence (ONLINE, AWAY, DND, OFFLINE). Updated by a timer from the backend.
location: Near user avatars in DMs or user profiles.

sub.name: StatusIcon
sub.description: A small badge reflecting the presence state.

name: UserStatusUpdateOverlay
description: Dialog for users to set/change custom status with optional emoji, extends BaseOverlay.
location: Accessed by clicking the userâ€™s avatar or presence icon.

sub.name: StatusInputField
sub.description: Input field for typing a custom status message.

sub.name: StatusEmojiSelector
sub.description: Picker for an emoji to display alongside the status.

name: EmojiReactionPicker
description: Pop-up for selecting emojis to react to a message. Omits emojis with deleted=true.

sub.name: EmojiCategoryTabs
sub.description: Tabs for switching between categories of emojis.

sub.name: EmojiSearchField
sub.description: Search field for looking up emojis by name.

name: PreferencesOverlay
description: Settings for notifications, theme, and account details. Extends BaseOverlay.
location: Opened via a profile or settings icon.

sub.name: NotificationSettings
sub.description: Configure mention notifications, do-not-disturb, etc.

sub.name: ThemeSelection
sub.description: Choose between light/dark theme.

sub.name: AccountManagement
sub.description: Edit profile or external accounts linking.

name: NewChannelGroupCreationOverlay
description: Wizard for creating a new channel or DM group, extends BaseOverlay.
location: Accessed from the Channel List or a plus icon in the sidebar.
